alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield, southwestern McCone and northwestern Prairie Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Flowing Wells Rest Area, or 29 miles southwest of Circle, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cohagen, Flowing Wells Rest Area and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
